meanings.definition: A person who is arrogant or conceited.
meanings.sent1: Some bigheads think they are better than everyone else.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a bigheads and show off all the time.
meanings.sent3: The bigheads in the group always want to be the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: Her bigheads made it hard for her to make friends.
meanings.sent5: The bigheads in the office always talk about themselves.

meanings.sent1: His bigheads made it difficult for him to accept criticism.
meanings.sent2: She needs to work on controlling her bigheads.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was just a beginner, his bigheads made him act like an expert.
meanings.sent4: Her bigheads were like a balloon ready to burst.
meanings.sent5: The bigheads in the room clashed with each other.

meanings.definition: A type of fish with a large head.
meanings.sent1: The bigheads in the aquarium were fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent2: The bigheads swam gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent3: The bigheads in the pond were the stars of the show.
meanings.sent4: The bigheads moved slowly, their large heads shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The bigheads were the kings of the underwater world.
